,src:require("".concat(item.image))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{className:"d-flex flex-column align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"model-Container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{className:"mb-2",children:item.model})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"disc-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:item.desc})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"price",children:["Price: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",item.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"dark",className:"m-2 px-3",onClick:()=>decQtry(item.id),children:"-"}),item.qty,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"dark",className:"m-2 px-3",onClick:()=>incQty(item.id),children:"+"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"dark",className:"w-100",children:"Buy Now"})]})]},item.id))})})]});}export default Products;
